change.text: Marking request scopes as JSON parsed for better tracking
scope debug information
Added notion of sessions in creation or destruction on a thread basis for use in listener implementations and other cases where the scope is not available.
No longer creating scopes for already invalidated sessions.
Reverted faulty fix concerning scope renewal from 6.7.13. The session invalidation must happen before the scope ends in order to still be able to access the scope from listeners!
Providing thread local access to session ID during createSession, can be used to avoid creating additional sessions in the course of a listener action.
Extended error handling on request initialization in filters and added possibility for custom exception handling.
Added possibility for scope aware servlets to better steer the used application ID (can be used for servlets with dynamic application ID)
Fixed so renewal of session scope will properly end the old scope in all cases
Added a basic scope helper

Added handling so JSON body initialization in RequestWebScopeNoMultipart is skipped in case an error is present in the request dispatcher (avoid multiple reading of the request in case of error handler redirects)
Changed handling for JSON body initialization in RequestWebScopeNoMultipart to be OPT-IN directly using a request attribute '$request.scope.jsonbody=true'
Disabled handling for JSON body initialization in RequestWebScopeNoMultipart by default and changed the logic for enabling it via the IRequestWebScopeInitializer
Better exception handling for RequestWebScopeNoMultipart when trying to initialize JSON body for offline requests
Added new method for retrieving SessionApplicationWebSingletons explicitly passing the application ID
Added better handling of session scopes during destruction (now available via the WebScopeManager)
Added new base class for session listener providing methods for before and after session creation and destrution
Fixed faulty MimeType check for parsing JSON request body
Added propagation of RequestDispatcher error attributes to request scope
update phloc-json to 3.0.0
update phloc-html to 4.4.2
update phloc-webscopes to 6.7.2
update phloc-commons to 4.4.4
update phloc-json to 2.6.1
Extended request scope to automatically interpret JSON request bodies and make all provided JSON properties accessible via request attributes
In AbstractObjectDeliveryServlet fixed so a possible leading slash is trimmed from the file name
Extended IRequestWebScopeWithoutResponse interface to support encode(Redirect)Url with ISimpleURL parameter
Prepared for Maven central release
Added method IRequestWebScopeWithoutResponse.getRequestParamMap ()
Improvements for session activation/passivation
Improvements for session activation/passivation
Removed all deprecated methods in *Singleton classes
Fixed potential recursive invalidation of unhandled scopes in WebScopeManager.onSessionEnd
Updated to phloc-commons 4.1.0
Added new Servlet-Init-Parameters 'deniedRegExs' and 'allowedRegExs' to class AbstractObjectDeliveryServlet for maximum flexibility in allowance and denial
Added new Servlet-Init-Parameter 'allowedFilenames' to class AbstractObjectDeliveryServlet to allow the delivery of certain filenames
Added some debug logging to the servlets in this project
Added new Servlet-Init-Parameter 'deniedFilenames' to class AbstractObjectDeliveryServlet to disable the delivery of certain filenames
Updated to phloc-web 5.3.0
Added new base class AbstractWebScopeAwareTimerTask
Updated to phloc-commons 4.0.9
Extended IRequestWebScopeWithoutResponse with the method getAttributeAsFileItem(String)
Updated to phloc-commons 4.0.3
Fixed naming of singleton methods, so that the scope type is included in the method name
Added new classes AbstractWebScopeAwareCallable and AbstractWebScopeAwareRunnable
Deprecated WebScopeTestInit in favor of WebScopeAwareTestSetup so that the name is comparable to ScopeAwareTestSetup from phloc-scopes
Extended API of WebScopeTestInit so that a usage with something other than JUnit is easier
Removed deprecated class WebScopeAwareTestSetup
Added call to CommonsCleanup in WebScopeTestRule
Updated to phloc-commons 4.0.0
Fixed template parameters of getSingletonIfInstantiated method
Updated to phloc-scopes 6.1.0

Made WebScopeTestRule more flexible
